languages.text: Когда-то боги ходили среди эльдаров — учили, направляли, оберегали их. И не было преград между смертными и их покровителями.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Игрок понимает что композиция статуй изображают историю расы Аэльдари 2

languages.text: The Aeldari's gods once walked among them, teaching, guiding, protecting them from harm. There were no boundaries between mortal creatures and their patrons.
languages.original_text: Когда-то боги ходили среди эльдаров — учили, направляли, оберегали их. И не было преград между смертными и их покровителями.

traits.locale_text: The Aeldari's gods once walked among them, teaching, guiding, protecting from harm. There were no boundaries between mortal creatures and their patrons.
The Aeldari's gods once walked among them, teaching, guiding, protecting from harm. There were no boundaries between mortal creatures and their patrons.
The Aeldari's gods once walked among them, teaching, guiding, protecting them from harm. There were no boundaries between mortal creatures and their patrons.
The Aeldari's gods once walked among them, teaching, guiding, protecting them from harm. There were no boundaries between mortal creatures and their patrons.
The Aeldari's gods once walked among them, teaching, guiding, protecting them from harm. There were no boundaries between mortal creatures and their patrons.

languages.text: Les dieux des Aeldaris marchaient autrefois parmi eux et leur prodiguaient connaissances, conseils et protection. Il n'existait aucune barrière entre les créatures mortelles et leurs créateurs.
languages.original_text: The Aeldari's gods once walked among them, teaching, guiding, protecting them from harm. There were no boundaries between mortal creatures and their patrons.

traits.locale_text: Les dieux des Aeldaris marchaient autrefois parmi eux et leur prodiguaient connaissances, conseils et protection. Il n'existait aucune barrière entre les créatures mortelles et leurs créateurs.

languages.text: アエルダリの神々はかつて彼らと共に歩み、教え、導き、危害から守っていた。定命のクリーチャーとそのパトロンたちとの間に境界線はなかった。
languages.original_text: The Aeldari's gods once walked among them, teaching, guiding, protecting them from harm. There were no boundaries between mortal creatures and their patrons.

traits.locale_text: アエルダリの神々はかつて彼らと共に歩み、教え、導き、危害から守っていた。定命のクリーチャーとそのパトロンたちとの間に境界線はなかった。

languages.text: 艾达灵族的众神曾与他们同在，为他们提供教导与指引，保护他们免受伤害。在艾达灵族之中，凡人与他们的庇护主之间原本没有任何界限。
languages.original_text: The Aeldari's gods once walked among them, teaching, guiding, protecting them from harm. There were no boundaries between mortal creatures and their patrons.

traits.locale_text: 艾达灵族的众神曾与他们同在，为他们提供教导与指引，保护他们免受伤害。在艾达灵族之中，凡人与他们的庇护主之间原本没有任何界限。

languages.text: Die Götter der Aeldari sind einst unter ihnen gewandelt, haben sie gelehrt, geführt, sie vor Gefahr beschützt. Es gab keine Grenzen zwischen sterblichen Kreaturen und ihren Schutzherren.
languages.original_text: The Aeldari's gods once walked among them, teaching, guiding, protecting them from harm. There were no boundaries between mortal creatures and their patrons.

traits.locale_text: Die Götter der Aeldari sind einst unter ihnen gewandelt, haben sie gelehrt, geführt, sie vor Gefahr beschützt. Es gab keine Grenzen zwischen sterblichen Kreaturen und ihren Schutzherren.

languages.text: Hubo un tiempo en que los dioses de los Aeldari caminaron entre ellos inculcándoles conocimientos, guiándolos, protegiéndolos de todo mal. No existía separación entre las criaturas mortales y sus divinidades.
languages.original_text: The Aeldari's gods once walked among them, teaching, guiding, protecting them from harm. There were no boundaries between mortal creatures and their patrons.

traits.locale_text: Hubo un tiempo en que los dioses de los Aeldari caminaron entre ellos inculcándoles conocimientos, guiándolos, protegiéndolos de todo mal. No existía separación entre las criaturas mortales y sus divinidades.

languages.text: Aeldari tanrıları; bir zamanlar Aeldarilerin arasında dolaşır, onları eğitir, rehberlik eder ve zarar görmelerini engellerdi. Bu anlamda tanrılar, fâni yaratıklardan aşkın değildi.
languages.original_text: The Aeldari's gods once walked among them, teaching, guiding, protecting them from harm. There were no boundaries between mortal creatures and their patrons.

traits.locale_text: Aeldari tanrıları; bir zamanlar Aeldarilerin arasında dolaşır, onları eğitir, rehberlik eder ve zarar görmelerini engellerdi. Fâni yaratıklarla tanrıları arasında hiçbir sınır yoktu.
